name: Namhoon Lee
content: Namhoon Lee Toggle navigation Namhoon Lee Research Group Hiring Teaching Contact I'm an Assistant Professor in CSE and AI at POSTECH where I lead the Computational Optimization Lab. Previously, I received my PhD from the University of Oxford. I'm interested in optimization for large-scale machine learning. Prospective students: I'm recruting research interns for 2025-26 Winter. Please check this hiring page for more information.
